course_title: Adult Gerontology Acute Care NP IV
class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This advanced population-focused diagnosis, treatment and disease management course builds on prior knowledge of managing common acute/episodic and complex chronic health conditions and focuses on increasingly complex disease processes.
prerequisites: NRSG 833D and NRSG 834D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1584, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: H. Meissen, Status: Open
